technical_skills.languages: Languages: C++, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Sass, node.js, Python, Appscript

summary: • Managed a weekly job and several extracurricular activities successfully while simultaneously placing at the top of my classes
• Experienced with C++ through university courses
• Enthusiastic about learning, testing and challenging my problem-solving skills
• Love designing functional and appealing webpages

projects.title: Web-Design (HTML, CSS, Sass, cPanel, PHP)
data: • Expanded my experience with programming through learning HTML, CSS, Sass and PHP from online courses
• The purpose of my website is to display all my projects, acting as a digital resume. Link is in the header
• Programmed a working contact me page for my website using PHP

projects.title: Snake Game (JavaScript)
data: • Constructed a simple snake game using the p5js library
• Visualised Various sorting algorithms using the p5js library

projects.title: Robotics (Arduino, AutoCAD Inventor)
data: • Designed and programmed a competition level Vex robot with 8 teammates, placed 16th out of 64 teams for a regional competition
• Programmed mechanical actuators, ultrasonic and line sensors for Tetrix-Max class competitions
•  Used Inventor for 3D prototyping and printing a simple toy car

projects.title: Rube Goldberg Machine
data: • Assembled a Rube Goldberg Machine for a physics class event, tasked to launch an egg
• It was recognised by the science department as a skilled project
• Filmed the project, it can be viewed here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RDleIjJUa8M

projects.title: ResumeTailor (Nodejs, Javascript)
data: • A web app that allows a job applicants to tailor their resume with one simple command, allowing users to save hours while looking for a jobs
• Utilized node express to create web-server and serve up the appropriate assets
• Implemented jsDom in order to view resume edits in real time
• Executed an HTTPS API in Node.js with custom SSL to secure API endpoint

projects.title: Task Manager App (Javascript, Nodejs, Mongodb, Postman, Jest)
data: • A web app that manages your personal tasks
• Implemented a RESTful API with nodejs
• Integrated JSON web tokens for authentication and security
• Added email notifications and file uploads to enhance the user experience
• Deployed the web app on Heroku. Here is the url:_________

projects.title: Stock Analysis (Python)
data: • Conducted exploratory data analysis of stock prices to better understand financial crisis of 2007–2008
• Retrieved bank-stock data using pandas data-reader form yahoo finance
• Utilized pandas and numpy to organize and clean the data
• Visualized data utilizing the dynamic features of plotly and cufflinks, here is a link to my research: ______

projects.title: Machine Learning (Python - Scikit learn)
data: • Implemented basic machine learning models to real life datasets

projects.title: Decentralized Voter (Solidity, Truffle Framework)
data: • Wrote a decentralized webapp on the Etherium network, allowing users to vote for specific candidates
• Wrote a smart contract to conduct an election
• Deployed the contract on a local Etherium Blockchain

work.title: Newspapers
data: • Organized and delivered newspapers for The Brampton Guardian 3 days a week, for a 60-house route

work.title: Entrepreneur in Training, Conrad School of Entrepreneurship and Business, University of Waterloo
data: • Specialized entrepreneurship co-op work program consisting of a 1-week intense entrepreneurship bootcamp followed by 3 micro-placements of 5 weeks each at early-stage start-ups
<b> GrowthGenius (Appscript, python)<b>
